messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Pam
messages.msgSnippet: ... Wow - yeah - it was pretty cool what she said about homeschooling and about my kids . She never met them or spoke to us - just one of her aides did. She
messages.messageBody:
On Saturday, August 9, 2003, at 12:39 AM, Joylyn wrote:

> Did you know you were mentioned in some congressional hearing by
> Sanchez
> at some point?
>
> Brad was telling me about it. I guess someone that gave him a
> declaration had a copy of the transcript...

Wow - yeah - it was pretty cool what she said about homeschooling and
about my kids <G>. She never met them or spoke to us - just one of her
aides did. She gave a speech supporting homeschooling and included us
in her speech.

(Loretta Sanchez is congressperson from our area - she has a sister who
is also in Congress - which I think is the first-ever sister-pair of
congresspeople.)

>
> btw, I didn't tell you this, but he won his court battle today.

That is incredible - I'm just so jazzed!!!

--pam

messages.subject: Re: Pam
messages.msgSnippet: Sometimes I m so tired I can post the same thing twice!  sorry. Or I should say--sometimes I live up to my hair color. ;-) Joylyn
messages.messageBody:
Sometimes I'm so tired I can post the same thing twice! sorry.

Or I should say--sometimes I live up to my hair color. ;-)

Joylyn

Joylyn wrote:

> Did you know you were mentioned in some congressional hearing by
> Sanchez at some point?
>
> Brad was telling me about it. I guess someone that gave him a
> declaration had a copy of the transcript...
>
> btw, I didn't tell you this, but he won his court battle today. (this
> is a friend of mine who is in the middle of a court battle over
> custody issues re: his 5 year old son for those of you who don't
> know). He will announce tomorrow on HSC but the judge gave him full
> control over Pierre's education (his wife had obtained an emergency
> order for Pierre to go to school, Kindergarten which isn't even
> manditory here in california.) He was just beaming when he picked up
> Pierre (we had him this afternoon while Brad was in court, the poor
> kid is so stressed, he had three accidents while dad was gone. so sad.)
> Joylyn
>

messages.subject: Pam
messages.msgSnippet: Did you know you were mentioned in some congressional hearing by Sanchez at some point? Brad was telling me about it.  I guess someone that gave him a
messages.messageBody:
Did you know you were mentioned in some congressional hearing by Sanchez
at some point?

Brad was telling me about it. I guess someone that gave him a
declaration had a copy of the transcript...

btw, I didn't tell you this, but he won his court battle today. (this
is a friend of mine who is in the middle of a court battle over custody
issues re: his 5 year old son for those of you who don't know). He will
announce tomorrow on HSC but the judge gave him full control over
Pierre's education (his wife had obtained an emergency order for Pierre
to go to school, Kindergarten which isn't even manditory here in
california.) He was just beaming when he picked up Pierre (we had him
this afternoon while Brad was in court, the poor kid is so stressed, he
had three accidents while dad was gone. so sad.)

Joylyn
